TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VirtualPathData extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表使用 ASP.NET 路由架構的 URL 所產生路由和虛擬路徑的相關資訊。

span.span: Represents information about the route and virtual path that are the result of generating a URL with the ASP.NET routing framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用 ASP.NET 路由架構，執行個體，會在產生 URL 時類別由方法。When you generate a URL by using the ASP.NET routing framework, an instance of the class is returned by the method. 類別包含您在您呼叫時所提供的值比對路由的相關資訊方法。The class contains information about the route that matched the values that you provided when you called the method. 物件也包含在產生的 URL屬性。The object also contains the generated URL in the property. 屬性包含路由的自訂值。The property contains custom values for the route. 擷取用來產生所使用的 URL 路由物件屬性。You retrieve the route object that is used for generating the URL by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範建立 URL 的控制項為基礎的路由，具有名為的參數`action`和`categoryName`。The following example shows a control that creates a URL that is based on a route that has parameters that are named `action` and `categoryName`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Default.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.Routing.RouteBase route, string virtualPath) cil managed
Public Sub New (route As RouteBase, virtualPath As String)

param.name: route
param.span: 用來產生 URL 的物件。

span.span: The object that is used to generate the URL.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataTokens As RouteValueDictionary

summary.span: 取得路由定義的自訂值集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of custom values for the route definition.
A collection of custom values for a route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性，以擷取的值與路由相關聯，但是，不會用來判斷路由是否符合 URL 模式。You use the property to retrieve values that are associated with the route, but that are not used to determine whether a route matches a URL pattern. 路由處理常式可以使用這些值來處理要求。These values can be used by the route handler to process the request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Routing::RouteBase ^ Route { System::Web::Routing::RouteBase ^ get(); void set(System::Web::Routing::RouteBase ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來建立 URL 的路由。

span.span: Gets or sets the route that is used to create the URL.

value.span: 表示符合產生 URL 所用參數之路由的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the route that matched the parameters that were used to generate a URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定從路由定義建立的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL that was created from the route definition.
The URL that was generated from a route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要產生的 URL，請呼叫方法。To generate a URL, you call the method. 方法傳回的執行個體類別，其中包含此路由資訊。That method returns an instance of the class, which contains information about the route. 屬性包含產生的 URL。The property contains the generated URL. ## Examples 下列範例示範建立根據具有參數名稱的路由 URL 的控制項`action`和`categoryName`。The following example shows a control that creates a URL based on a route that has parameters that are named `action` and `categoryName`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Default.aspx.vb#2)]
